module.name: Course Seats
module.description: Intended for use with ATutor 2.2+. This module allows administrators to set the maximum number of seats available in any given course. Course Seats can be extended with the Payments (1.6+) module to automate purchase of additional seats on a course by course basis.

release.notes: Be sure to see the README file with this module for a description of features, and what gets disable so course seat limits can be enforced.
